```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, comment=NA)
```

# Add Libraries

```{r loadLibraries}
library(processNC)
library(raster)
```
# Get files

```{r getFiles}
files <- list.files(paste0(system.file(package="processNC"), "/extdata"), pattern=".nc", full.names=T)
files
```

# Subset Files

```{r subsetFiles}
# subsetNC(file[1], ext=c(8.5, 14, 47, 51), startdate)
maps <- subsetNC(files, ext=c(8.5, 14, 47, 51),
                 startdate=1990, enddate=1999)
plot(maps[[1]]/10)
```
